title: KitchenAid 5 Ultra Power Speed Hand Mixer - KHM512, Aqua Sky
descriptions:
Meet the KitchenAid 5-Speed Hand Mixer (Model KHM512) in Aqua Sky. It’s simple to use, gentle on the hands, and easy to clean.

Why you’ll like it:
- Easy to hold, easy to lift: Compact and lightweight, so it won’t tire your arms.
- Five simple speeds: Turn the dial to choose what you need. 
  - Speed 1: Gently stir in chunky items like nuts or chocolate chips.
  - Speed 5: Whip egg whites or heavy cream until fluffy.
- Simple cord: The cord swivels and locks, so it stays out of your way whether you’re right- or left-handed.
- One-button release: Press a single button to remove the beaters—no tugging.
- Strong, lasting beaters: Stainless steel Turbo Beaters handle cookie dough, mashed potatoes, and meringues.
- Easy cleanup: Beaters are dishwasher-safe.

What it’s good for:
- Cookie dough and cake mixes
- Mashed potatoes
- Whipping egg whites and heavy cream
- Stirring in nuts, chips, and other chunky ingredients

Trusted brand:
- KitchenAid is the #1 mixer brand in the world based on retail sales revenue (source: Euromonitor International Ltd.; more info at mixerclaim.kitchenaid.com).

Quick start:
1) Plug in and lock the cord to your preferred side.  
2) Insert beaters until they click.  
3) Start at Speed 1, then turn up as needed.  
4) Press the button to release beaters when finished.  
5) Put beaters in the dishwasher.

A clear, calm helper in the kitchen—reliable, comfortable, and ready for everyday mixing.
